definition: Mt Tai 泰山[Tai4 Shan1] in Shandong/abbr. for Thailand

sentences.english: Nine Thai officers from the anti-narcotics unit have since been charged with murder.
sentences.chinese: 泰國緝毒部隊的九名人員已被指控犯有謀殺罪。

sentences.english: Mr. Prasart hasn’t neglected the more modern, Western-facing Thailand in his collections.
sentences.chinese: P先生沒有忽略更能代表現代西式泰國的藏品。

sentences.english: Thailand, Malaysia and the Philippines are considering new price controls or subsidies.
sentences.chinese: 泰國，馬來西亞以及菲律賓都在考慮價格控制和補貼。

sentences.english: There is a little bit of information of swine hepatitis E virus in Thailand.
sentences.chinese: 在泰國，有少量關於豬戊型肝炎病毒的信息。

sentences.english: The Rooks Holiday Hotel, Mae Hong Son is set in the midst of a fascinating valley in Northern Thailand.
sentences.chinese: 茹克思假日飯店坐落在泰國北部一處迷人的山谷之中。

sentences.english: His idea of fun was to fly to Thailand to fight in a kickboxing tournament.
sentences.chinese: 他的想法就是去泰國參加跆拳錦標賽。

sentences.english: So what about sports? What kind of sports do Thai delegation expect gold from?
sentences.chinese: 那麼運動方面，哪些運動是泰國隊希望奪金的呢？

sentences.english: The unidentified armed group used guns to force the Chinese crew to increase speed sailing towards Thailand.
sentences.chinese: 不明武裝用槍逼着中國船員加足馬力向泰國駛去。

sentences.english: The Tai groups of Thailand evolved into diverse sub-ethnicities in the process of formation and development.
sentences.chinese: 泰國的泰語民族在形成發展過程中，形成許多支系。

sentences.english: It's crazy Pattaya on the Gulf of Thailand.
She is the most beautiful and perfect ladyboy in Thailand.
sentences.chinese: 她是泰國最完美的變性女孩。

sentences.english: While there, he plans totake a high-speed train ride from Beijing to Tianjin, said government spokesman Yongyuth Mayalarp said.
sentences.chinese: 他計劃坐高鐵從北京到天津，泰國政府發言人說。

sentences.english: The elephants paint pictures in Elephant Show at Nongnooch Tropical Garden.
sentences.chinese: 泰國芭達雅東芭樂園的大象表演畫圖。

sentences.english: We sincerely hope that Thailand enjoys social harmony, economic development as well as prosperity and peace.
sentences.chinese: 衷心祝願泰國社會和諧，經濟發展，國泰民安。

sentences.english: Phornchanok Achalaboon. M. M. in Entrepreneurship Management, Mahidol University, Thailand.
sentences.chinese: 碩士，泰國瑪希隆大學，企業家職能管理專業。

sentences.english: He is the man beauty from Thiland.

definition: South Korea (Republic of Korea)/Han, one of the Seven Hero States of the Warring States 戰國七雄|战国七雄[zhan4 guo2 qi1 xiong2]/Korea from the fall of the Joseon dynasty in 1897
variant of 臺灣|台湾[Tai2 wan1]
United Kingdom 聯合王國|联合王国[Lian2 he2 wang2 guo2]/United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland/abbr. for England 英格蘭|英格兰[Ying1 ge2 lan2]
Europe/abbr. for 歐羅巴洲|欧罗巴洲[Ou1 luo2 ba1 Zhou1]
